snippet.title: BCS National Championship: Notre Dame, Alabama revered, reviled by fans
snippet.description:
Wednesday January 2, 2013 11:55 am
Here it is, everyone, the game America is loving to hate. It's Notre Dame (beloved by millions, reviled... Pick your poison, people. All that's Blue and Gold or the Crimson king of the SEC. "If everybody is so upset... (Alabama's is No. 2), and a redshirt freshman quarterback in Everett Golson who is as exciting as he is befuddling.
